questions.question: Which of the following options will save edits made to a record?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Save

questions.question: How would a user return to their default homepage/default workspace?
choices: By clicking on the image in the top left corner
Through the main menu icon in the left panel
By clicking their user menu on the top right corner
By refreshing the entire browser page
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: By clicking on the image in the top left corner

questions.question: Data publications allow a user to extract data from Archer and load it to:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An external database

questions.question: An iView or Widget can be used to display which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Any of these

questions.question: Ruth noticed that after updating a record and closing it, the new information wasn't in the records when she opened it again. This is because:
choices: She did not have permission to edit that record
She did not select Submit Record to Workflow
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She did not select Save

questions.question: What is the focus of the Third Party Management solution area in Archer?
choices: Managing audit trails for external partners
Managing supplier relationships and monitoring third-part risks
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Managing supplier relationships and monitoring third-part risks

questions.question: A keyword search searches for a specific word or string within one or more:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Applications

questions.question: Applications which are entirely designed and deployed by your organization for your specific business needs are called:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: On-Demand Applications

questions.question: Applications house specific sets of ___________:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Records

questions.question: A field that cannot be edited but changes based on information entered into other fields is a:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Calculated field

questions.question: Which of the following best describes a Solution within Archer?
choices: A grouping of applications designed to address a specific business need
A collection of users with the same access level
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A grouping of applications designed to address a specific business need

questions.question: In Archer, which feature allows importing data from external systems?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Data Feed Manager

questions.question: In order to determine what an organization has purchased from Archer, an administrator should check the ______________:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Licensing Information

questions.question: Users can filter search results based on any of the following EXCEPT which of the following options?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Size of Records

questions.question: Sonja was viewing a record in Archer. She wanted to add a note to it, but the Edit button was greyed out. What would cause this?
choices: This application was set to Retired
Someone else was working on the record at the same time
Sonja does not have editing permissions for this record
Sonja's account has been locked for security reasons
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sonja does not have editing permissions for this record

questions.question: How does Archer Evolv Risk help organizations manage risk more effectively?
choices: By focusing only on financial risks
By integrating media analytics with risk management
By providing a centralized platform for monitoring and mitigating risks in real time
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: By providing a centralized platform for monitoring and mitigating risks in real time

questions.question: Which is NOT a method by which data can be imported into Archer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scanning

questions.question: Which of the following features is most commonly associated with Archer Evolv Compliance?
choices: Continuous monitoring of regulatory changes, document processing, obligations catalog, and controls alignment
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Continuous monitoring of regulatory changes, document processing, obligations catalog, and controls alignment

questions.question: Once a user performs an advanced search against an application, the search may be saved as a(n):
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Report

questions.question: If a user wanted to provide additional information to a questionnaire item, they should:
choices: Open and submit a comment attached to the question
Add a question to the Question Library that pertains to the additional information
Add an attachment to the questionnaire and reference the question number
Send an email to the requester
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Open and submit a comment attached to the question

questions.question: Andre's job as a business resiliency analyst includes logging and reporting crisis events to his Chief Risk Officer and Chief InfoSec Officer. Currently, Andre maintains this data on a spreadsheet that he updates and emails to the CRO and CISO as necessary. How might this practice be putting his organization in danger of increased risk?
choices: Potential data loss due to corrupted files/attachments
Human error involved in manually updating a spreadsheet
Updating and sharing a file after a crisis event does not allow for risk teams to analyse trends and proactively prevent risk
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Data Feeds are ideally used for which of the following?
choices: Small uploads of data on an ad-hoc basis
End users to designate another use to serve in their place during periods when they are out of office
Data to be sent out of Archer and into an external database on a regular cadence
Archer data feed to be added or modified on a pre-defined schedule
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Data to be sent out of Archer and into an external database on a regular cadence

questions.question: Ayanna no longer needs to receive a specific weekly risk report Subscription Notification. In order to opt out of the emailed report, she should:
choices: Contact her administrator and ask them to remove her from the distribution list
Navigate to email subscriptions, locate the report in her subscriptions list, and uncheck the subscribed box
Create a filter to automatically delete the report in her email client
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Navigate to email subscriptions, locate the report in her subscriptions list, and uncheck the subscribed box

questions.question: What does Archer Evolv Risk use to enhance its risk management processes?
choices: AI and machine learning predict potential risks and optimize workflows
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: AI and machine learning predict potential risks and optimize workflows

questions.question: Which is NOT a right that can be assigned to a user in Archer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: APPEND

questions.question: Terri created a report and saved it, but wants to edit the filters she used to make the data more relevant for her team. Which option should she select from the report toolbar?
choices: Modify (Classic UI) or Edit Search (SaaS UI)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Modify (Classic UI) or Edit Search (SaaS UI)

questions.question: Serena has five tasks within Archer assigned to her, and she can see all five tasks in a "My Tasks" report on her dashboard. Serena visits her teammate Beth, and peers over her shoulder to see the same dashboard on Beth's screen. Beth's dashboard displays ten tasks, not the five that Serena sees. What is the most likely cause?
choices: Serena's tasks have not reached the same status value as Beth's
Beth's My Tasks report has been modified to include tasks assigned to both Beth and Serena
The report on the dashboard is using a filter on the Assigned To field, that limits the results returned to be only those for whom the user currently logged in can access
Five additional tasks have been assigned during the walk Serena took from her desk to Beth's desk.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The report on the dashboard is using a filter on the Assigned To field, that limits the results returned to be only those for whom the user currently logged in can access

questions.question: If granted the appropriate administrative rights, end users can:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: The main difference between a Personal Report and a Global Report is:
choices: Global reports are clickable, while Persona reports are display-only
Personal reports are only visible to the person who created the report, which Global reports are always visible to all Archer users
Personal reports are only visible to the person who created the report, which Global reports can be set to be seen by others, as deigned by the person saving the report
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Personal reports are only visible to the person who created the report, which Global reports can be set to be seen by others, as deigned by the person saving the report

questions.question: The Audit Management solution area in Archer focuses on which primary activity?
choices: Managing internal and external audit processes and tracking findings
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Managing internal and external audit processes and tracking findings

questions.question: The Activity icon in the top bar shows:
choices: Full audit logs of all user activity
The user's 10 most recently added, edited, or viewed records
All records added in the last hour
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The user's 10 most recently added, edited, or viewed records

questions.question: Archer's Global Search allows users to search across:
choices: Both Archer and the user's intranet
Only data within Archer that has been updated in the past 12 months
All data within Archer that the use has access to
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All data within Archer that the use has access to

questions.question: Which Archer Use Case allows an organization to consolidate information from multiple regulatory bodies into a single, searchable repository?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Regulatory and Corporate Compliance management

questions.question: Reymundo wants to create a report that allows the user to group the results by a specific field. In the Visualization Display Options, he should select:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hierarchical

questions.question: JavaScript Transporters are a type of:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Data Feed

questions.question: Which of the following best describes a record in Archer?
choices: An individual data entry in an application
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An individual data entry in an application

questions.question: Which of the following is a key feature of Archer Evolv Risk?
choices: Integration of risk data with real-time security data
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Integration of risk data with real-time security data

questions.question: A workspace is an organized display of which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dashboards

questions.question: In Archer's Classic UI, the History Log field can be displayed as a grid or as a simple link. How does the History log behave in the new SaaS UI?
choices: All of these behaviours are true in the SaaS UI
Changes in the log can be clicked to bring attention to the fields that were changed
Users can filter the changes made by data, user(s), and/or fields
It appears as a change Log in the right panel
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these behaviours are true in the SaaS UI

questions.question: Archer records that leverage Advanced Workflow will have an interactive feature that non-Advanced Workflow records do not have. Which of the following best describes this addition to the record?
choices: A Remove icon appears bear the top of the record. Users can either unsubscribe from the workflow for this record, or delete the record entirely
An Actions dropdown menu appears near the top of the record. Users can use this dropdown to advance the record to the next stage of the workflow
An email icon appears near the top of the record. Users can use this icon to quickly notify other users that the record is read to move to the next stage of the workflow
A copy icon appears near the top of the record. Users can use the Copy functionality to replicate the record and send it to multiple users all within the current stage of the workflow
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An Actions dropdown menu appears near the top of the record. Users can use this dropdown to advance the record to the next stage of the workflow

questions.question: Anca hasn't seen a specific quarterly report email and wants to see whether she's subscribed to that particular email notification. Which menu should she access to determine whether she is subscribed to that email?
choices: User Name Menu > Preferences > Data Import History
User Name Menu > Discussion Forum Preferences
User Name Menu> Preferences > Email Subscription
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: User Name Menu> Preferences > Email Subscription

questions.question: If a user selects the Email Record (Share > Email) option, this feature will:
choices: Open a new email in the user's email client with a link top the record
Sign the recipient up for the email notifications
Send the recipient an email that a record is available for view
Send the recipient a downloadable copy of the record to their email
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Open a new email in the user's email client with a link top the record

questions.question: Doug wants to create a report that can include one or more fields from a cross-referenced application. On the search page, Doug should choose:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Add New Relationship

questions.question: Beatrice wants to remind her team when quarterly risk reports are due within 7 days. Her best course of action would be to:
choices: Create a task for each team member each quarter and assign them to the task
Create a scheduled notification based on the risk report due date
Create an external document with a running list of upcoming due dates and embed It into a team iView
Create an embedded video on the team dashboard so team members can remind each other of due dates
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Create a scheduled notification based on the risk report due date

questions.question: What is the value of Archer Evolv Compliance?
choices: Powering your regulatory change program with AI
Building a centralized global library of both regulatory and non-regulatory obligations
All of these answers are correct
Establishing controls aligned with business requirements
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these answers are correct

questions.question: Archer offers one Use Case that is seen in nearly every Solution Area. This Use Case helps organizations document events (Findings) that need to resolved, often for compliance reasons. What is the name of this often-shared Use Case?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Issues Management

questions.question: Saving a search as a report:
choices: Allows you to enter a description of the report for later reference
All of these statements are true
Saves the search settings, but does not save the exact data set returned in the search
Allows you to designate the search as Personal, Shared or Global
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these statements are true

questions.question: When an end user logs in to Archer their home view is of a(n):
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dashboard

questions.question: Srishti and Jamie both work as audit managers at XYZ Corporation. Srishti notices that Jamie has additional reports showing in her Audit Manager dashboard, and Srishti does not have access to them. What might be the cause of this?
choices: Srishti was hired after Jamie, so any records created before her first day of employment would not show up
Srishti has not added the addition Audit Manager iViews or widgets to her dashboard
Srishti and Jame do not have the same access rights
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Srishti and Jame do not have the same access rights

questions.question: Which of the following is not found in the Archer menu bar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Map display controls

questions.question: Record fields marked with red asterisks are:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Required fields

questions.question: Nate's primary task in Archer is to log findings as a submitter. Which Archer workspace option would allow him to quickly create a new finding without having to navigate to the application every time?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Quick Links

questions.question: After performing a global search, the user may opt to transfer the search to:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A specific application

questions.question: A report can be exported in which file format(s)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Any of these answers

questions.question: When a user creates a Scheduled Report Distribution, Archer will run the report:
choices: When pushed by the report creator
When a user requests the report
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Automatically

questions.question: Chenoa opened a record and noticed a field was uneditable. This could possibly be because:
choices: The field is a calculated field
All of these are possible reasons
The field is marked Read-Only by a data-driven event
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these are possible reasons

questions.question: Laszlo transferred from the Risk Analysis team to the Business Resiliency team. He needs to be able to access records and Business Resiliency plans in Archer. Laszlo should:
choices: Ask his Archer administrator to assign him to the appropriate groups and access roles for his new position
Update his user profile and change his password
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ask his Archer administrator to assign him to the appropriate groups and access roles for his new position

questions.question: When creating a new record, you may encounter some fields marked as required, but there is no mechanism for you to manually enter data in these fields. What is the most likely reason for this?
choices: These fields can only be populated by an administrator
These fields only accept data entry from a scheduled data feed
These fields are calculated and will be populated once the record is saved
These are private fields and you have not been given access to view the data within
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: These fields are calculated and will be populated once the record is saved

questions.question: Groups of pre-configured Applications that are ready to use immediately after deployment of Archer are called:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Use Cases

questions.question: If a user ran multiple searches to verify the existence of specific data within Archer and they realized the data they were looking for did not exist, which of the following actions should the user take to add a new record into Archer? (Assume the user has access rights to create records for this scenario.)
choices: Click the Modify (Classic UI) or edit Search (SaaS) icon to modify Archer's structure
Click the Email icon to send an email to the administrator and ask for the data to be added
Adjust the current search criteria to expand the search to include records outside of Archer
Click the New Record icon (Classic UI) or Add New Record (Saas) to create a new record in Archer
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Click the New Record icon (Classic UI) or Add New Record (Saas) to create a new record in Archer

questions.question: Access to the Archer platform is controlled by:
choices: Inclusion of a person in stage within Advanced Workflow
Selection of a person's name in an Assigned To field
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: User Accounts (username and password)

questions.question: All system users automatically belong to a built-in group named ______________
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Everyone

questions.question: If a user wished to access all of the available records in a specific application, the correct navigation path would be:
choices: None of these answers are correct
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Workspace > Solution > Application

questions.question: Steven is looking at a returned set of search results in the Classic UI. He sees a small pencil icon next to a field name in one of the columns of data. What does this pencil icon signify?
choices: The field with a pencil icon is still sitting in Draft status
The data is this field can be emailed separately from the rest of the data set
Steven can edit the field for various records right from within the search results themselves
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steven can edit the field for various records right from within the search results themselves

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of Archer Evolv?
choices: To provide an end-to-end risk management and compliance framework
To manage inventory levels in real-time
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To provide an end-to-end risk management and compliance framework

questions.question: In the new SaaS UI, what does the Attention feature in the right panel do?
choices: It draws the user's attention to comments left in a questionnaire that needs to be addressed
It draws the user's attention to new features in Archer
It draws the user's attention to fields that are empty
It draws the admin's attention to the faulted data feeds
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It draws the user's attention to fields that are empty

questions.question: Archer's primary purpose is:
choices: To support risk management and compliance activities
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To support risk management and compliance activities

questions.question: Archer Solution Areas contain groups of related:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Use Cases

questions.question: Clicking on the area representing results within a chart will open:
choices: An enlarged version of the chart
A list of records associated with that chart statistic
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A list of records associated with that chart statistic

questions.question: If a user clicks on a linked record ID, the link will take the user to:
choices: Any available attachments to the record
A diagram showing all related records
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The record itself
